title: Trace
name: Trace
description: Displays and logs debugging data about the state of an application at the time the cftrace tag executes.

attributes.name: abort
attributes.description: Calls cfabort tag when the tag is executed

attributes.name: category
attributes.description: User-defined string for identifying trace groups

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description:
Displays trace code in line on the page in the
            location of the cftrace tag, addition to the debugging
            information output.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description:
User-defined string, which can include simple variable,
            but not complex variables such as arrays. Outputs to cflog
            text attribute

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Corresponds to the cflog type attribute; displays an
            appropriate icon.
            - Information
            - Warning
            - Error
            - Fatal

attributes.name: var
attributes.description:
The name of a simple or complex variable to display.

            Useful for displaying a temporary value, or a value that
            does not display on any CFM page.

attributes.name: follow
attributes.description: If true, Lucee follows the object defined in the [var] attribute and will log any changes to it. Ignored when attribute [var] is not defined.

attributes.name: caller
attributes.description: scope used for var evaluation, if not defined the current scope is used.
